channel.title: Distributed-Firewall on From 0.985mhz... to several Ghz
channel.description: Recent content in Distributed-Firewall on From 0.985mhz... to several Ghz

item.title: "General Error" NSX-T Manager Firewall Section
item.description: If you have missing objects in the firewall section before upgrading from NSX-T 2.1 to 2.2 you will experience a General Error in the GUI, on the Dashboard, and in the Firewall section of the GUI. You will even get general error when doing API calls to list the DFW sections https://NSXMGRIP/api/v1/firewall/sections: { "module\_name" : "common-services", "error\_message" : "General error has occurred.", "details" : "java.lang.NullPointerException", "error\_code" : "100" } If you have upgraded the fix is straight forward.
